open_source.name: Checkmate
open_source.headline: Code Standards Enforcement Tool
longdesc: Checkmate is an application to help enforce pre-defined coding standards.  It uses existing tools, such as PHP_CodeSniffer, and aggregates violations into a single, consistent report.  It is designed to be run from a command line or pre-commit/pre-receive hook, but can be adapted to almost any setting.

open_source.name: php-finance
open_source.headline: Proof-of-Concept PHP Extension
longdesc: php-finance is a proof-of-concept PHP extension to add financial calculation functions, such as interest rate functions, present and future value, etc.  The primary purpose of this project is for me to learn how to build PHP extensions.

open_source.name: Lore
open_source.headline: Object-Oriented LDAP in PHP
longdesc: Lore is a PHP library that takes the pain out of working with LDAP.

presentations.description: This presentation serves as an introduction to unit testing and test driven development.  It covers basic principles of unit testing that can be applied to any language and testing framework, as well as the benefits of test-driven development.
